title: Drakensang Online
description: A full-fledged 3D action MMORPG playable in browsers. Explore a vast fantasy world as one of several character classes, completing quests, battling monsters, and collecting loot. Features detailed 3D graphics, skill-based combat, PvP, dungeons, and a persistent online world with thousands of players.
how_to_play: Use mouse clicks to move your character and attack enemies. Number keys 1-9 activate special abilities and potions. Create a character from multiple classes, each with unique skills and playstyles. Complete quests, join guilds, trade with other players, and participate in group dungeons and PvP combat.
